mapper.sql: bsp.sampling_plan_id, bsp.sampling_plan_code, bsp.sampling_plan_desc, bsp.test_level, bsp.sample_standard_id, bsp.org_id, bsp.remark, bsp.`status`, bsp.create_user_id, bsp.create_time, bsp.modified_user_id, bsp.modified_time, bsp.is_delete
mapper.select:
select , su.user_name AS create_user_name, sus.user_name AS modified_user_name, bo.organization_name,bss.sample_standard_name FROM base_ht_sampling_plan AS bsp LEFT JOIN ocean_v2.sys_user su ON bsp.create_user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN ocean_v2.sys_user sus ON bsp.modified_user_id = sus.user_id LEFT JOIN base_organization bo ON bsp.org_id = bo.organization_id LEFT JOIN base_sample_standard bss ON bss.sample_standard_id = bsp.sample_standard_id
and date_format(bsp.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and bsp.sampling_plan_code like CONCAT('%', #{samplingPlanCode}, '%')
and bsp.sampling_plan_desc like CONCAT('%', #{samplingPlanDesc}, '%')
and bsp.test_level like CONCAT('%', #{testLevel}, '%')
and bss.sample_standard_name like CONCAT('%', #{sampleStandardName}, '%')
order by create_time desc
